description.displayText: We LOVE Alyssa. She is the first person we trusted to baby-sit our infant daughter. Her experience is extensive and most importantly our daughter is happy in her care. Alyssa is great at communicating/confirming when we schedule her for baby-sitting, flexible, and easy going. She is a gem in the crazy, hard to navigate childcare world in NYC. We are happy to give any further information on Alyssa should you want her to care for your child(ren).
description.originalText: We LOVE Alyssa. She is the first person we trusted to baby-sit our infant daughter. Her experience is extensive and most importantly our daughter is happy in her care. description.displayText: We hired Alyssa as our Nanny to watch our 4 month old daughter when I returned to work.  From the moment I met Alyssa I knew she would be a great fit. She is warm, caring, loving, responsible and attentive. She engaged my daughter from day one, singing, reading, playing and doing whatever needed to get her to sleep, including many long walks!!!  Alyssa worked with us for 7 months and we were so sad to see her leave due to an opportunity she could not pass up! We are always excited to see Alyssa when she comes to visit. I would hire her again in a heartbeat and when she was local still called upon her for date night babysitting or if we needed help in a pinch. We consider Alyssa a part of our family and are so grateful for the time we got to spend with her and still miss her!

description.displayText: Alyssa worked for our family from the time our daughter was a month old until almost a year old. Our daughter just LOVED her, as do we. Alyssa was very caring and attentive, and helped our daughter with her early development. Alyssa has excellent instincts and I never worried about our daughter while she was in Alyssa's care.  She comes highly recommended from our entire family!

description.displayText: Alyssa is the best! She was always on time with a smile! She played with my son from the second she walked in the door to the hugs goodbye. I highly recommend her!
